title: Amazing views, spacious 2 bed / 1 bath, great amenities, 1200 sq ft
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1554/month', 'Location:', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 1-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1200 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '● Business Center', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Central Air', '● Dogs & Cats Welcome', '● Extended living room area', '● Fitness Center', '● Picnic Area with Grill', '● Smoke Free', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● Tennis Courts', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Lake on Site', '● Laundry Facilities', '● MARTA Access', '● Pet Care', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Scenic Lake', '● Se Habla Espanol', '● Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '● Wooded Views', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '● Sunroom', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Extended living room area', '● Fireplace in Select Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '● Views', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Shadow Lake Apartments offers many amenities to our residents.', 'Take a swim in our lakeside pool, or enjoy grilling out in one of the courtyards while picnicking under a gazebo.', 'Tennis courts and a fitness center is also available, and feel free to update your social media status in our business center.', 'Pet Policy:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Shadow Lake:', 'show contact info', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '89F83FC5E4B0457']
